segments.text: I'm just observing this kitchen moment quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands at the sink, focused on drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's on, causing the basin to overflow steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms on the floor beneath her, untouched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy balances on a stool near the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the open cookie jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other holds a plate, perhaps to steady himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts slightly, but he seems steady for now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl nearby extends her arm, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window reveals a neat garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight filters in, highlighting the domestic details.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter beside the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, framing the outdoor view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a snapshot of everyday life with a hint of playfulness.
segments.speaker: PAR
